arStrings.szText: After Shapeshifting, your Spirit costs are reduced by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}[{SF_0}*100*{SF_1}|%|]{/c}. If you reach {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} stacks, this bonus resets and reduces the Cooldown of your Ultimate Skill by {c_number}{SF_3}{/c} seconds.
You have {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} reduced Spirit costs per stack.
